DOC.brief_summary: This study aim assess risk solid organ transplant ( SOT ) rejection follow vaccination Pandemrix™ and/ seasonal influenza vaccination .
DOC.brief_title: Assess Risk Solid Organ Transplant Rejection Following Vaccination With Pandemrix™ UK
DOC.detailed_description: Data safety pandemic H1N1 vaccination transplant patient relatively limit ; date , although study show transient increase alloreactivity , evidence H1N1 vaccine cause clinical rejection organ dysfunction . In addition , study show influenza infection know independent risk factor rejection . Considering transplant recipient target population immunisation future pandemic vaccine , important investigate risk rejection follow vaccination patient population . Using self-controlled case series design allow control implicitly potential confounding factor , study aim investigate risk solid organ transplant rejection ( liver , kidney , lung , heart , pancreas ) follow vaccination Pandemrix™ United Kingdom Clinical Practice Research Datalink GP Online Database ( CPRD GOLD ) . Data Hospital Episodes Statistics database also use . The effect seasonal influenza vaccination various infection include influenza H1N1 also explore .
DOC.criteria: Subject define acceptable CPRD GOLD . Subject least one solid organ transplant rejection report CPRD GOLD and/or HES overall study period ( 01 September 2006 31 October 2010 ) . • Subject HES match one subject CPRD GOLD .
